name: Morf Health
headline: Workflow automation for healthcare providers
description:
Morf is an integration platform that allows healthcare providers to sync patient data and automate workflows across their tools. For example, when a patient submits an intake form, Morf creates a patient record in an EHR and sends insurance information for an eligibility check. You can think about it like Segment + Zapier for healthcare providers.

Morf helps their customers eliminate tedious administrative tasks and empowers them to focus on patient care as they grow.

founders.name: Montana Scher, Founder
founders.description: After studying product design + computer science at Stanford, I learned how to launch and iterate on great products at Google and Square. I moved into healthcare in order to work on problems I cared deeply about. As the first product hire at Parsley Health, I led the team that built our patient data infrastructure and the tech to launch and grow our virtual care offering. I'm starting Morf to solve the problems we faced at Parsley -- to empower the next gen of digital healthcare.

founders.name: James Thompson, Founder
founders.description: I have built and managed teams at a number of early-stage companies in the highly regulated health-tech and fin-tech / data spaces. As an engineering contributor I've created simplified data models and services for complicated healthcare problems in seed and Series A+ stage companies. I have also built and managed peta-scale data pipelines.  My entrepreneurial interest in health-tech was borne out of having my patented work licensed by a major UK biotech company.

# Launch seamless signup, scheduling, and intake in a few hours
[Learn More!](https://morf.health/<https:/plans.morf.health>)
# The fastest way to automate your healthcare operations
Morf syncs patient data across the tools you use to sign up patients, deliver care and run your business. Get a unified view of your patient and use it to build custom automated workflows.

Why Morf
# Setup integrations with ease and start saving time immediately.
No coding required. No wrangling third party APIs. Connect your applications and start sending data so that you can streamline your processes and automate tedious administrative tasks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651d9b16b50975866c384a4b_insurance-workflow.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651ddd961931fd7b9ade7c30_Group%2035804.png)
# Power your business with a unified view of your patient
A centralized view of your patients across all of your tools - ops, marketing, clinical, scheduling, messaging, revenue cycle management, etc... Access the data you need to enable personalized experiences for your patients.
[Learn More](https://morf.health/</how-it-works>)
Why Morf
# Synchronize your tools in one place
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/6524b084c942b934674f4592_insurance-workflow.png)
#### Setup integrations with ease and start saving time immediately.
No coding required. Connect your applications and start sending data so that you can streamline your processes and automate tedious administrative tasks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651ddd961931fd7b9ade7c30_Group%2035804.png)
#### Access a centralized view of your patients across all your tools.
Empower your team with a unified picture of a patient. Use the data you collect from across your tools to to enable a personalized experiences for your patients.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/6524b084c942b934674f4592_insurance-workflow.png)
## Setup integrations with ease and start saving time immediately.
No coding required. Connect your applications and start sending data so that you can streamline your processes and automate tedious administrative tasks.
## Access a centralized view of your patients across all your tools.
Empower your team with a unified picture of a patient. Use the data you collect from across your tools to to enable a personalized experiences for your patients.

Use Cases
# Spotlight: Everything you need to sign up and onboard patients
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651dda15c9f40985e5574fa0_Frame%2035813%20\(2\).png)
#### Capture leads
Upon collecting an email address from a prospective patient, we can create a contact in your CRM and we’ll send an event to your analytics tool for conversion tracking.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651dda513db8bbacc14417ac_Group%2035812%20\(1\).png)
#### Populate patient records
Create and continue to update a patient record in your EHR as you receive their eligibility and intake information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/652456adced95caab049c581_slide-3.png)
#### Automate visit prep
Once your new patient schedules their first visit, follow up by sending them your medical history forms and creating a task for your admin to prep for the visit.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651dda91b528c95cab18beca_Group%2035818.png)
#### Integrate your scheduling service
Embed Morf’s customizable scheduling UI directly in your sign up flow. We fetch availability from your scheduling service and enable provider matching based on your prospective patients needs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651d768484b1b048585a91c9_Vector%20\(11\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650f42b238fe3eaebeb3b89b/651d77688a212676e4f37a49_Vector%20\(12\).svg)
Capture leads and track status

generated_description:
**Morf Health: Automating Healthcare Workflows**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Morf Health is a rising star in the health-tech sector, focused on streamlining operations for healthcare providers. At its core, Morf offers a powerful integration platform designed to synchronize patient data across various tools, effectively eliminating manual, tedious administrative tasks. The company aims to empower healthcare professionals to concentrate on patient care instead of getting bogged down with workflows.

### The Mission
Morf Health’s mission is straightforward: automate workflows for healthcare providers. Think of Morf as a blend of Segment and Zapier specifically tailored for the healthcare industry. It handles tasks like creating patient records in Electronic Health Records (EHR) and performing insurance eligibility checks when a patient submits an intake form.

### What They Offer
Morf Health allows healthcare providers to:
- **Automate Patient Onboarding**: Quickly sign up and onboard patients, capturing leads and seamlessly integrating with existing data systems.
- **Centralized Patient View**: Access a unified view of patient data across clinical, operational, and marketing tools, enhancing personalized patient experiences.
- **Integrate Easily**: No coding required. Providers can connect various applications and start automating immediately, thereby saving time and streamlining processes.

### Use Cases
Morf Health offers numerous use cases that benefit healthcare organizations:
- **Lead Capture & Conversion Tracking**: Automatically create contacts in your CRM when new email addresses come in.
- **Patient Record Updates**: Continuously update patient records as eligibility and intake information rolls in.
- **Visit Preparation**: Automate the process of sending medical history forms and preparing staff for upcoming patient visits.
- **Custom Scheduling**: Embed a customizable scheduling interface directly into patient sign-up flows.

### With a Small but Mighty Team
Morf Health operates with a lean team of six employees. Despite their size, they are making a big impact and are already trusted by notable names in the healthcare industry, showcasing their capabilities early on.

### Why Choose Morf?
Morf Health stands out for its ease of use and rapid deployment—allowing healthcare providers to have better insights and more time to focus on what really matters: the patients. By automating labor-intensive tasks and synchronizing disparate data sources, Morf positions itself as a critical partner for healthcare providers looking to modernize their operations.

For more information or to get started with automating your healthcare workflows, visit [Morf Health](https://morf.health).
